Blood samples can be utilized to identify bird species through DNA analysis. Forensic ornithology plays a crucial role in various contexts, including criminal investigations, wildlife management, and conservation efforts. By providing accurate identification of bird remains, this field aids in prosecuting wildlife crimes and protecting endangered bird species.
